page.title: 12Home Life In Norton Area.
page.content: {Shopping. Some people buy their groceries at Telford Town Centre or Bridgnorth. Other people shop in Shifnal or Madeley. People without a car shop in Norton village or travel on the local bus to Bridgnorth. When they get home from shopping, people put the food in cupboards, freezers and fridges, pantries or cellars. For other kinds of shopping, such as clothes, they go to Telford Town Centre, Bridgnorth, Shrewsbury, Wolverhampton or Dudley. {Cleaning. We have electric hoovers, which pick up the dust on carpets and upholstery. We polish wood and metal surfaces. There are many easy_clean surfaces in our homes, especially in kitchens and bathrooms.
